title: Traits and Features
content:
vl 7

Invoke the Bladesong. You gain a +proficiency bonus to Armour Class and your movement speed increases by 3 m / 10 ft. You also gain Advantage in Acrobatics and a +proficiency bonus to Constitution saving throws.

You also unlock Bladesong Climax and the ability to accumulate Bladesong Charges in combat.

You can't wear Medium or Heavy Armour or Shields while Bladesinging

You must be wielding a Dagger, Longsword, Rapier, Scimitar, Shortsword, or Sickle.

You gain proficiency with Light Arm
